job.title: Data Engineer - Cloud
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Management Consulting
job.description: ltstronggtltugtCompany DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtCapTech is a team of master builders creators and problem solvers who help clients grow efficient successful businesses We unite diverse skills and perspectives to transform how data systems and ingenuity enable each client to advance whats possible in a changing worldltbrgtltbrgtAs perceptive partners our USbased consultants find inspiration in the unknown and enjoy getting our hands dirty solving our clients myriad of challenges Across industries and business goals we fuse technical depth and analytical prowess with creative savvy to move clients forward This drive helps each organization use technology management and insight to turn ideas into action Together we create outcomes that exceed the expected  which is one of the reasons weve been on the Inc 5005000 list for over a decadeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtJob DescriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtCapTech Data Engineering consultants enable clients to build and maintain advanced data systems that bring together data from disparate sources in order to enable decisionmakers We build pipelines and prepare data for use by data scientists data analysts and other data systems We love solving problems and providing creative solutions for our clients Cloud Data Engineers leverage the clients cloud infrastructure to deliver this value today and to scale for the future We enjoy a collaborative environment and have many opportunities to learn from and share knowledge with other developers architects and our clientsltbrgtltbrgtSpecific responsibilities for the Data Engineer  Cloud position include ltbrgtltulgtltligtDeveloping data pipelines and other data products using Amazon Web Services AWS Microsoft Azure or Google Cloud Platform GCP ltligtltligtAdvising clients on specific technologies and methodologies for utilizing cloud resources to efficiently ingest and process data quickly ltligtltligtUtilizing your skills in engineering best practices to solve complex data problems ltligtltligtCollaborating with end users development staff and business analysts to ensure that prospective data architecture plans maximize the value of client data across the organization  ltligtltligtArticulating architectural differences between solution methods and the advantagesdisadvantages of each ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtQualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTypical experience for successful candidates includes   ltbrgtltulgtltligtExperience delivering solutions on a major cloud platform ltligtltligtAbility to think strategically and relate architectural decisionsrecommendations to business needs and client culture ltligtltligtExperience in the design and implementation of data architecture solutions ltligtltligtA wide range of production database experience usually including substantial SQL expertise database administration and scripting data pipelines ltligtltligtAbility to assess and utilize traditional and modern architectural components required based on business needs   ltligtltligtA demonstrable ability to deliver production data pipelines and other data products This could be hands on experience degree certification bootcamp or other learning ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtSkillsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtSuccessful candidates usually have demonstrable experience with technologies in some of these categoriesltbrgtltulgtltligtLanguages SQL Python Java R C  C  C ltligtltligtDatabase SQL Server PostgreSQL Snowflake Redshift Aurora Presto BigQuery Oracle ltligtltligtDevOps git docker subversion Kubernetes Jenkins ltligtltligtAdditional Technologies Spark Databricks Kafka Kinesis Hadoop Lambda EMR ltligtltligtPopular Certifications AWS Cloud Practitioner Microsoft Azure Data Fundamentals Google Associate Cloud Engineer ltbrgtltligtltulgtAdditional InformationltbrgtltbrgtWe provide challenging and impactful opportunities in our client work and internal teams while keeping individual interests in mind We want everyone at CapTech to be able to envision a lifelong career here which is why we offer a variety of career paths based on your skills and passions As a CapTecher you will experience exciting and rewarding roles that help you grow and make a difference while having fun along the wayltbrgtltbrgtAt CapTech we offer a competitive and comprehensive benefits package including but not limited toltbrgtltulgtltligtCompetitive salary with performancebased bonus opportunities ltligtltligtThree comprehensive Medical Plan options PPO and HDHP as well as Dental and Vision coverage ltligtltligtCompany paid basic Life and ADampampD ShortTerm and LongTerm Disability Insurance ltligtltligtMatching 401k ltligtltligtCell Phone stipend ltligtltligtCompetitive Paid Time Off social activities ltligtltligtMentor program to help you develop your career ltbrgtltligtltulgtCapTech is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering a culture of equality inclusion and fairness  each foundational to our core values We strive to create a diverse environment where each employee is encouraged to bring their unique ideas backgrounds and experiences to the workplace For more information about our diversity Inclusion and belonging efforts click HEREltbrgtltbrgtAt this time CapTech cannot transfer nor sponsor a work visa for this position Applicants must be authorized corp to corp agreements ltligtltligtCapTech is a DrugFree work place ltligtltligtCandidates must have the ability to work at CapTechs client locations ltligtltligtSome positions may require travel ltligtltligtCapTech has not contracteddoes not contract with any outside vendors in its recruitment process If you are interested in this position please apply to CapTech directlyltligtltulgt
